description: nude bathers in a river; trees; nude woman with her hair in a bun, waving, seen from back, seated on river bank in foreground, right of center; inscription in LRC
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Signed
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2005; sold in April, for PROO, with another proof of 4th state, one of the 1st state, and banquet booklet, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [A MES AMIS / en Souvenir DU / HUIT MAI / MCMXXII / A. Lepère]; LRC below image, in pencil: [au (illegible) fameux banquete, l\'ami Maurio Lezarre (?) / A Lepère]
title: Menu: To My Friends, May 8, 1912
